oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Evaluation of flunixin meglumine and suture selection on post-operative pain following abdominal surgery in cattle
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Kleinhenz, M. D.
Smith, J. S.
Jackson, N.
Gorden, P. J.
Kleinhenz, K. E.
Schleining, J. A.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: analgesics
suture selection
pain
flunixin meglumine
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: There is very little published literature objectively measuring analgesics and influence of suture selection on pain in bovine surgery. The objective of this study was to determine the impact of intravenous flunixin meglumine and suture material selection on pain measures following ventral midline celiotomy.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2019; 394
